caption:
“He who kneels before God can stand before any man.”

Reflection:
The soul that bends in reverence rises unshaken. In surrender lies unbreakable strength.

Commentary:
This saying teaches that humility before God gives courage before the world. True power comes from spiritual submission, not pride.
